abbasid_ribs.name: Abbasid Ribs
abbasid_ribs.description: Succulent Abbasid ribs, made using a time-honored Abbasidian recipe.

apple.name: Apple
apple.description: A boldly red and brazenly juicy apple.

applejack.name: Applejack
applejack.description: A bowl of apple-y, oat-y, cinnamon-y applejack. Yummy hot or cold.

awesome_stew.name: Awesome Stew
awesome_stew.description: Chunky awesome stew, so thick you can eat it with a spork.

banana_no_names.name: Banana No-Names
banana_no_names.description: One banana fried to crispy, buttery perfection and drizzled with honey. Mmmm.

berry_bowl.name: Berry Bowl
berry_bowl.description: A very merry bowl of berries.

best_bean_dip.name: Best Bean Dip
best_bean_dip.description: Bowl of beany, dippy bean dip.

big_salad.name: Big Salad
big_salad.description: It's bigger than small. It's a big salad.

birch_candy.name: Birch Candy
birch_candy.description: Candy made of boiled birch syrup so concentrated and so sweet that one too many and you may see god. Or at least the tooth fairy. And they'll be crying.

birch_syrup.name: Birch Syrup
birch_syrup.description: A bottle of sticky birch syrup.

blue_sno_cone.name: Blue Sno Cone
blue_sno_cone.description: A delicious, refreshing Blue Sno Cone with a tangy hit of iMG. Blended to perfection using ice, hooch, and the very finest elemental additives and preservatives, it tastes exactly what the the concept of blue should taste like. And a little like raspberry, weirdly.

bubble_and_squeak.name: Bubble and Squeak
bubble_and_squeak.description: Meaty, carroty, potato-y mush, fried to perfection.

bunch_of_grapes.name: Bunch of Grapes
bunch_of_grapes.description: A heaping handful of red grapes.

butterfly_butter.name: Butterfly Butter
butterfly_butter.description: Butterfly butter might seem like an odd thing, but it is used in many delicious cooking recipes.

cedar_plank_salmon.name: Cedar Plank Salmon
cedar_plank_salmon.description: A wild salmon cooked on a wild cedar plank.

cheese.name: Cheese
cheese.description: A nice wedge of holey cheese.

cheezy_sauce.name: Cheezy Sauce
cheezy_sauce.description: A crock full of pleasingly, teasingly cheezy sauce.

chillybusting_chili.name: Chilly-Busting Chili
chillybusting_chili.description: A tureen of fiery chilly-busting chili.

choice_crudites.name: Choice Crudites
choice_crudites.description: A platter of the very finest crudites.

cloudberry_jam.name: Cloudberry Jam
cloudberry_jam.description: A jar of tart cloudberry jam.

common_crudites.name: Common Crudites
common_crudites.description: Everyday crudites served in an easy-to-carry cup.

corn_off_the_cob.name: Corn-off-the-Cob
corn_off_the_cob.description: All the goodness of corn-on-the-cob, without the cob.

creamy_catsup.name: Creamy Catsup
creamy_catsup.description: One gallon of the creamiest catsup in all the land.

death_to_veg.name: Death to Veg
death_to_veg.description: For those who wish a violent end to all harmless vegetables, and desire to feast upon their flesh.

desssert_rub.name: Desssert Rub
desssert_rub.description: Gritty, sandlike, and strangely sweet, this is both sandy like the desert, and sweet like dessert, and, as such, has the s's of both.

eggy_scramble.name: Eggy Scramble
eggy_scramble.description: A messily scrumptious pile of eggs.

exotic_fruit_salad.name: Exotic Fruit Salad
exotic_fruit_salad.description: An enticing array of exotic fruits.

expensive_grilled_cheese.name: Expensive Grilled Cheese
expensive_grilled_cheese.description: Expensive cheese expensively grilled on expensive bread.

flummery.name: Flummery
flummery.description: Few things in this life are as tasty as a masterfully prepared flummery. "Just like Mom used to make!" you might say. If you had a mom, that is.

fortifying_gruel.name: Fortifying Gruel
fortifying_gruel.description: One bowl of lumpy fortifying gruel.

fried_noodles.name: Fried Noodles
fried_noodles.description: A small slippery hill of fried noodles.

fried_rice.name: Fried Rice
fried_rice.description: A bowl of fried rice with lots of nummy bits.

frog_in_a_hole.name: Frog-in-a-Hole
frog_in_a_hole.description: A perfect egg perfectly fried in a perfect hole in a slice of bread.

gammas_pancakes.name: Gamma's Pancake
gammas_pancakes.description: One mouthwatering pancake, just like Gamma used to make.

glitchepoix.name: Glitchepoix
glitchepoix.description: Combination of vegetables known as the holy quadrinity of the Glitchean cuisine.

greasy_frybread.name: Greasy Frybread
greasy_frybread.description: A fresh chunk of butter-running-down-your-arms greasy frybread.

green.name: Green
green.description: So fundamental, so intrinsic to the basic laws of culinary science and a healthy spleen that there was only ever one word needed to describe it: Green. So, so green.

green_eggs.name: Green Egg
green_eggs.description: One order of fried green eggs, hold the ham.

green_sno_cone.name: Green Sno Cone
green_sno_cone.description: A bright green blend of ice, hooch and elements make a drink the color of days when spring is born, or nights when the northern lights perform. Packed with a modest hit of iMG, winter cannot fade it. Mainly because it's 40% elemental additives and preservatives.

hash.name: Hash
hash.description: A serving of oddly satisfying hash.

hearty_groddle_sammich.name: Hearty Groddle Sammich
hearty_groddle_sammich.description: A meaty Groddle sammich with extra hot 'n' fizzy sauce for extra hot 'n' fizzy energy.

heston_mash.name: Heston Mash
heston_mash.description: This is not just mashed potato, this is the fanciest, zaniest, most delicious mashed potato Ur has ever ingested. And yet, really, it's still just mashed potato.

corn_syrup_squares.name: Hi-Sucrose Corn Syrup Square
corn_syrup_squares.description: Densely-packed brick of pure brain-melting sweetness, proving that sometimes the sum of many food items is either something that is only fit for use as building material in a fairy unicorn happy-palace, or a candy.

honey.name: Honey
honey.description: A brimful jar of raw golden honey.

hot_n_fizzy_sauce.name: Hot 'n' Fizzy Sauce
hot_n_fizzy_sauce.description: One jar of potent hot 'n' fizzy sauce. This combustible comestible is packed with energy and all kinds of flaming goodness.

hot_potatoes.name: Hot Potatoes
hot_potatoes.description: If a glitch gives you this 'tato, drop it like it's hot. Because it is.

hungry_nachos.name: Hungry Nachos
hungry_nachos.description: Are you hungry for nachos or are nachos hungry for you? It's nacho decision to make.

ixstyle_braised_meat.name: Ix-Style Braised Meat
ixstyle_braised_meat.description: A side of rich, meaty meat, braised a la Ix.

juicy_carpaccio.name: Juicy Carpaccio
juicy_carpaccio.description: A tempting platter of juicy carpaccio with all the trimmings.

king_of_condiments.name: King of Condiments
king_of_condiments.description: Otherwise known as the blandest rub in all of Ur. Meh.

lazy_salad.name: Lazy Salad
lazy_salad.description: Sliced tomatoes and cheese. It doesn't get much lazier than a lazy salad.

legumes_abbassidienne.name: Legumes Abbassidienne
legumes_abbassidienne.description: The most sophisticated, chic ways to prepare a bean: simply, classically, with a smile, a touch of flair, and a really big guillotine.

lemburger.name: Lemburger
lemburger.description: A single-decker Lemburger with all the fixins.

lemon.name: Lemon
lemon.description: One half of a nice pair of lemons.

luxury_tortellini.name: Luxury Tortellini
luxury_tortellini.description: It's tortellini, stuffed with extravagance and drizzled with grandeur.

maburger_royale.name: Maburger Royale
maburger_royale.description: It's not just seasoned beans in a bun smothered in stinky cheese - it's so much more than that. Oh no wait. It's just that.

meat_gumbo.name: Meat Gumbo
meat_gumbo.description: A bowl of thick, meaty gumbo.

mexicali_eggs.name: Mexicali Eggs
mexicali_eggs.description: A heaping serving of bean-infused eggs.

mild_sauce.name: Mild Sauce
mild_sauce.description: Bland ho! It's some inoffensive mild sauce.

naraka_flame_rub.name: Naraka Flame Rub
naraka_flame_rub.description: A slightly spicy minute on the lips, a horrifically painful burning in the general area of the hips, some people say. But what do they know? Wussies.

oaty_cake.name: Oaty Cake
oaty_cake.description: A slightly dry, somewhat crumbly oaty cake.

oily_dressing.name: Oily Dressing
oily_dressing.description: A bottle of cheap, yet strangely satisfying, oily dressing.

olive_oil.name: Olive Oil
olive_oil.description: A bottle of top-notch olive oil, no virgins required.

onion_ring.name: Onion Ring
onion_ring.description: Battered and fried, these are onions prepared the way Pot intended. Rumored to be popular amongst the elves. Wait, what's an elf?

onion_sauce.name: Onion Sauce
onion_sauce.description: A jar of eye-wateringly zesty onion sauce.

orange_sno_cone.name: Orange Sno Cone
orange_sno_cone.description: A chillingly refreshing bright Orange Sno Cone, with a medium amount of iMG. A perfect blend of Ice, Hooch, and elemental additives and preservatives, it is the epitome of an orange drink. Not orange the fruit, that is, orange the colour. It's more of a concept.

pad_tii.name: Pad Tii
pad_tii.description: Tii has not heard of this dish yet. Chances are it would not approve. Do not tell Tii. Please.

pi.name: Pi
pi.description: The recipe for Pi was described in ancient times by Alphimedes of Salatu, who also purportedly invented a heat ray for attacking the Rook. (If the heat ray ever existed, it has long since been lost.) It was later improved upon by Ludolph the Cerulean, named for his bright blue skin. Ludolph gave a Pi to several of the giants. Tii immediately stated that Pi was irrational. Pot, on the other hand, declared this to be the best pie heâ€™d ever eaten - transcendental, in fact.

pineapple_upside_down_pizza.name: Pineapple Upside-Down Pizza
pineapple_upside_down_pizza.description: A plate of exotically topsy-turvy pizza.

pocket_salmon.name: Pocket Salmon
pocket_salmon.description: It's like salmon, but in your pocket! Pocket Salmon! The handy friendly fish-at-your-fingertips that's always ready to go! Why settle for boring old underwater catch-me-if-you-calmon-salmon when you could have the ever-accessible, always-dependable, never-stinky always-yummy Pocket Salmon instead! POCKET SALMON! [TM. Always read the label. Terms and conditions apply]

potato_patty.name: Potato Patty
potato_patty.description: One potato, mashed and fried in a pleasing disc shape.

potcorn.name: Potcorn
potcorn.description: Pot corn is a regular corn made to pop because its kernels have a hard moisture-sealed hull and a dense starchy interior. This allows pressure to build inside the kernel until an explosive "pop" results.

potians_feast.name: Potian's Feast
potians_feast.description: The greatest, most magnificent, energy-filled, Pot-approved combination of nourishment. A fitting dish to make or eat for any serious Potian.

pottine.name: Pottine
pottine.description: So wrong. But so, so right.

precious_potato_salad.name: Precious Potato Salad
precious_potato_salad.description: Potato salad, traditionally an affordable staple at Glitchen birthdays, is now fit for fancy dinners and lavish banquets with the addition of the particularly precious Trump Rub.

proper_rice.name: Proper Rice
proper_rice.description: A steaming bowl of slightly sticky rice.

pumpkin_pie.name: Pumpkin Pie
pumpkin_pie.description: When people use the phrase 'as nice as pie', they are, in fact, talking about this pie. What goes into it? Fresh pumpkin, crispy pastry, spicy spices, and a big dollop of love. (That's an attitude rather than a hidden ingredient, before you start feeling nauseous).

purple_sno_cone.name: Purple Sno Cone
purple_sno_cone.description: A refreshing and delicious purple Sno Cone. A sophisticated blend of Ice, Hooch and elemental additives and preservatives. Now you too can get all the social frisson of Purple but with none of the nutritional or mental expansion benefits (contains considerable iMG, though).

rainbo_sno_cone.name: Rainbo Sno Cone
rainbo_sno_cone.description: A rainbo in Sno Cone form, eating this blend of all the other Sno Cones makes your tongue tingle, your sinuses snigger and your spine spontaneously decide to go on a tropical vacation to Shimmyville. Warning: Contains gloriously high levels of iMG.

bacon.name: Rasher of Bacon
bacon.description: A delicious, greasy, surprise Piggy treat from the Piggy's newly discovered Orthogonal Meat Generator (OMG).

carobish_treats.name: Raw Bio-Organic Carob-ish Treat
carobish_treats.description: A chewy, crunchy, apparently ethically-sourced, gritty 'candy-alternative' with a whiff of winter. Leaves a unique chocolatey aftertang you can't quite put your finger on.

red.name: Red
red.description: Some things are so basic, so fundamental that they only need one word to describe what they are. This perfect blend of tomato, onion and butterfly milk sums up the essence of red.

red_sno_cone.name: Red Sno Cone
red_sno_cone.description: A tongue-tingling spine-shiveringly Red Sno Cone. A seamless blend of Ice, Hooch, and a secret blend of elemental additives, preservatives, iMG and raw energy that make you feel slightly, though not to any copyright-infringing extent, like you may have wings.

rich_tagine.name: Rich Tagine
rich_tagine.description: A steaming pot of zesty, slow-cooked tagine.

roasted_pepitas.name: Roasted Pepitas
roasted_pepitas.description: Crunchy, nutty, seeds pulled from a pumpkin ready roasted (it must be that hot knife you used). May cause a roasted pumpkin to grow in your stomach. No, not really. Will cause you to feel smug about your healthy snacking choices, though.

salmon_jaella.name: Salmon Jaella
salmon_jaella.description: An assortment of fresh Salmon from Jal, Rice, Legumes and veggies thrown together into a dish Jal-loving Glitchen identify themselves by.

secret_sauce.name: Secret Sauce
secret_sauce.description: An enigmatic jar full of mysteriously yummy secret sauce.

simple_bbq.name: Simple BBQ
simple_bbq.description: Some hot meat with tangy sauce.

snack_pack.name: Snack Pack
snack_pack.description: An apple, some cheese, and a couple of pickles. Not quite a meal, but it'll do until dinner.

stinky_cheese.name: Stinky Cheese
stinky_cheese.description: A lump of cheese that's been left to stand around for a while. It's what the French call 'ripe'. You could age it longer, but glory only knows what the French would call it then.

stock_sauce.name: Stock Sauce
stock_sauce.description: As plain and every day as a woman laughing while eating salad, no one even things about Stock Sauce any more. Perhaps they should.

super_veggie_kebabs.name: Super Veggie Kebab
super_veggie_kebabs.description: Chunks of assorted vegetables on a fun pointy stick!

swank_zucchini_loaf.name: Swank Zucchini Loaf
swank_zucchini_loaf.description: A good loaf can be made out of anything. A great loaf is made from Zucchini and talks about how rich it is.

sweet_n_sour_sauce.name: Sweet 'n' Sour Sauce
sweet_n_sour_sauce.description: Is it sweet? Is it sour? It's both! It's sweet 'n' sour sauce!

swing_batter.name: Swing Batter
swing_batter.description: After roughly chopping with a knife, this batter is not mixed, blended or whisked, but swung at the end of the arm. Swing batter, batter batter swing, batter (as they say).

tangy_noodles.name: Tangy Noodles
tangy_noodles.description: A generous serving of zesty, lemony tangy noodles.

tangy_sauce.name: Tangy Sauce
tangy_sauce.description: A large jar of gloppy tangy sauce.

tasty_pasta.name: Tasty Pasta
tasty_pasta.description: A bowl of extra-long noodles with rich bolognese sauce.

trump_rub.name: Trump Rub
trump_rub.description: So called because it trumps all the other rubs in expense, flavour, and the ability to be extremely annoying (if you get it in your eye).

urfu.name: Urfu
urfu.description: A moist beige flaccid matter, imbued with the ability to suck up other flavours.

vegmageddon.name: Vegmageddon
vegmageddon.description: No rich urth-born root or brave brassica can survive the searing heat of a Pugilist Grill. It is a slow, vicious end for them. But justified, they say, in the name of 'Healthy Living'.

very_stinky_cheese.name: Very Stinky Cheese
very_stinky_cheese.description: Smelling like a manatee bathed in celery juice and old surgical stockings,  goodness knows what would happen if you aged this connoisseurial cheese any longer. You could give it a go, thoughâ€¦

very_very_stinky_cheese.name: Very, Very Stinky Cheese
very_very_stinky_cheese.description: This is the very, very stinkiest cheese you've ever seen, or it would be if you could see through the thick veil of tears it's inducing. You can't make this any stinkier. It wouldn't be fair to everyone else.

wavy_gravy.name: Wavy Gravy
wavy_gravy.description: One pint of wavy gravy. It's so good, you'll eat it with a spoon.

whortleberry_jelly.name: Whortleberry Jelly
whortleberry_jelly.description: One jar of homemade whortleberry jelly, made from the pulverized remains of a thousand quivering whortleberries.

wicked_bolognese_sauce.name: Wicked Bolognese Sauce
wicked_bolognese_sauce.description: A small jar of wicked bolognese sauce, on spaghetti or on its own for a meaty treat.
